content:
In Beryslav of the Kherson region, the military of the Russian Federation dropped an explosive object from a drone for a 71-year-old man when he was on the street.

About thisreportedKherson Ova.

The victim was diagnosed with explosive trauma and injury to the leg. He was taken to the hospital for medical care.

Later, another person was injured as a result of dropping explosives from the drone.

The 27th anniversary of the Berislav resident went to the hospital. She was diagnosed with a mine-alphabet injury, a shoulder injury, a contusion.

In addition, on Saturday afternoon, Antonivka was struck. An 83-year-old woman who was at home at this time was an explosive trauma, closed traumatic brain injury and contusion.

In a state of moderate severity, the woman was taken to the hospital. Doctors provide her necessary help.
title: The enemy fired Antonovka in Kherson region, in Berislav two victims due to dropping explosives from drone

author: Army Inform
